medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening abdominal pain and low-grade fever.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began last year and has worsened over the past 2 days. Associated with chronic nausea, both pain and nausea are severely worsened by eating. Since discharge from a recent admission, the patient has not been able to tolerate oral intake and has experienced constipation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Systemic lupus erythematosus, Sjogren's syndrome, chronic abdominal pain, Raynaud's phenomenon, fibromyalgia, depression, migraine headaches.
